message: Accept my generous offer and let's end this game early!
Let's split it 50/50 and end the game fairly!
I'll take 70%, you can have the rest. It's still a decent split!
You're running out of time, Bob! Take what you can get!
I'll take most of it, but I'll give you a small consolation prize. You can't say no to this!
You're running out of options, Bob. Take this or leave it!
I'll take almost all of it, but I'll give you a tiny piece of the pie. It's better than nothing!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'll take almost all of it, but I'll give you a tiny fraction. It's almost nothing, but it's better than nothing!
This is my last stand, Bob. Take it or walk away!
I'll take almost all of it, and you can have the last $1000. It's not much, but it's something.
